mapper.delete:
delete from aa_yxdz where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select m.mfrsid,m.mfrsname from c_mfrs m left join cc_mg mg on m.mfrsid=mg.mfrsid left join c_goods g on g.goodsid=mg.goodsid where g.goodsid=4
select b.brandid,b.brandname from c_brand b left join cc_mg mg on b.goodsid = mg.goodsid left join c_goods g on g.goodsid=mg.goodsid where g.goodsid=4 and b.mfrsid = #{mfrsid} group by b.brandid;
